title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. D, pt. 603 - The College Capital Budget
content:

§ 603.1 - State assistance for capital costs
§ 603.2 - Form of the capital budget

§ 603.4 - Architectural fees for design and supervision of construction of buildings and sponsor services
§ 603.5 - Real property
§ 603.6 - Amendment to the capital budget
§ 603.7 - Capital cost chargeback for nonresident students

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. D, pt. 603

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§355, 6221, 6304, 6305, 6306; L. 1988, ch. 53

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
